summary:
Weapon Mod that adds a new two handed blade to the game.
Dragon Nodachi, slayer of dragons.
descriptionHtml:
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>x<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<

This mod adds a new Two Handed Sword to the game.
It\'s a Nodachi, japanese sword to slay the mighty dragons.
It has a powerful dragon damage enchantment, able to steal dragon\'s health, it\'s temperable but not disenchantable and high valued.

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>x<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<

NOT HD, It has vanilla textures.
ONLY ABLE TO GET through console command, just type \"Help Nodachi\" and you should see it\'s ID.
I\'ll change this later.

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>x<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<

It\'s a weapon I\'ve made for future works, just wanted to share it stand alone.

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>x<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<

#UPDATED!
No more knockback on hit and upgraded meshe.
Slightly curved blade and more detailed hilt and handle.
Hope to please everyone, any constructive suggestion, just go to the comments section.

And last, tell me what do you want for Vs03 the most.
Weapon droppable by Alduin? One Handed version? Craftable? Just give me your ideas.

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>x<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<

#WARNING!
Before installing the Nodachi Update, Delete [K]Dragon_Tachi.esp and [K]Dragon_Tachi.nif, or else you might have 2 identical weapons in your game.

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>x<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
author: Kur0u
